com.devwebsphere.jdbc.loader
Class BaseJDBCLoader

java.lang.Object
  com.devwebsphere.jdbc.loader.BaseJDBCLoader
Direct Known Subclasses:
GenericJDBCLoader
public abstract class BaseJDBCLoader
extends java.lang.Object

This class is meant as a base class for purequery loaders. It's main purpose is to provide a common table name and the getData method.

Author:
bnewport
